description:

Discontinued. My dumbass accidentally deleted all progress and can't recover it. More info on devlog.

A little turbowarp project that was made out of sheer boredom. This is also a remake of a remake of a game that was made by me back in 2021 in scratch.

<CONTROLS>

WASD - movement

Q - pause

Left Mouse - Fire projectile

(the rest is introduced in-game.)

<KNOW YOUR ENEMIES>

The -CHASER- is a red orb. They hit pretty weak, but they overwhelm you if you don't pay attention.

The -HOMER- is a purple triangle. Weak, fragile, and frankly a coward. This is a sniper that keeps away from you and shoots bullets at you. Run into them, and they'll literally quit life out of fear.
